Module it.polimi.ingsw.psp17
Package it.polimi.ingsw.connection.socket

Class SocketConnectionHandler

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.connection.ConnectionHandler
it.polimi.ingsw.connection.socket.SocketConnectionHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Runnable
public class SocketConnectionHandler extends ConnectionHandler implements Runnable
SocketConnectionHandler class used to manage connection via socket between server and client
See Also:

    • run

      public void run()
      Start the connection handler by getting the input and output streams of the socket connection, starting the pingThread, sending the first JoinGameRequest and start listening for new messages from the server
